ack.p: We are grateful to M. Jean, G. Létourneau, and S. Martin (Environnement Canada) for remote sensing and modeling assistance, and to S. Côté, S. Ménard, N. Rivard, and J. Sénécal (Parc national des Îles-de-Boucherville) for field work support. Comments from J. Brisson and of anonymous reviewers on an earlier draft were greatly appreciated.
